attributes.additional_details: Guaranteed basic income to every citizen, whether or not they are employed to ensure their survival and that they live in a dignified, humane way, preventing poverty, illness, homelessness, reducing crime, encouraging higher education and learning vocations as well as helping society become more prosperous as a whole.

rejection.details:
Please see following petition:

Petition Title: Citizens Income for all

Created by: Michael Moulding

Closing: 13/01/2015
